about_the_game:
Want to bring smooth licks and groovy jams into your own home? Of course, you do!

The tunes are tweaked for maximum orgynisational success and will help in any environment where your guests have long lists of kinks and demands.

The proceeds of this soundtrack will, just like the main game, be donated to Planned Parenthood* and it's a good move for anyone feeling generous and wanting to chip in a bit more.

This is the full-length version of all the luscious tracks that are perfect for bringing everyone together as closely as possible.

*) Default donation, if you want an alternative donation please set so in the main game settings.

  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: MP3 Format
